item.title: EF Code First & AppHarbor
item.description: Since my employer, Improving lined me up a new gig that uses Entity Framework Code First, I thought I kick off a learning side project with MVC3 and deploy it to AppHarbor. Everything seemed simple enough. Use Nuget to install the code first bits, hammer out a couple of model and a datacontext and BOOM! data goes into a database. It wasnâ€™t anything pretty, but I was ready to deploy it to AppHarbor.
